lead_paragraph: The Keeping Score column last Sunday, about the challenge of being a championship contender in men’s tennis during the Roger Federer era, misidentified a publication edited by James Martin, who commented on the difficulty of competing against a motivated Federer. It is Tennis magazine, not Tennis Week.
